meanings.definition: Quick to understand, learn, and devise or apply ideas; intelligent.
meanings.sent1: She is cleverer than her classmates in solving math problems.
meanings.sent2: The cleverer students finished their homework before the bell rang.
meanings.sent3: The cleverer squirrel outsmarted the others to get the most nuts.
meanings.sent4: Her cleverer mind was like a well-oiled machine, always ready to tackle new challenges.
meanings.sent5: The cleverer detective cracked the case in record time.

meanings.sent1: The cleverer solution to the puzzle was to think outside the box.
meanings.sent2: He became even cleverer at fixing things after taking the workshop.
meanings.sent3: The cleverer idea of using a paperclip as a bookmark saved the day.
meanings.sent4: Her cleverer approach to painting made her artwork stand out from the rest.
meanings.sent5: The cleverer inventor created a device that revolutionized the industry.
